main event: A witness observed an unidentified flying object in Redondo, Washington on June 20, 1952, describing it as moving slowly like a balloon.
interesting points: The observation lasted for approximately 25 minutes,The object was noted to be round or oval in shape and bright in color,The witness had previous sightings of similar objects since the 1940s,It was concluded that the object might have been a balloon,The witness expressed concern about the object's unusual appearance and motion.
witness description: Male, 25 years old, military job, had observed similar objects previously.
